# Script samples

# Sans

# Sans - left-to-right

Սցենար Armenian (Armenian script)
লিপি Bangla (Bengali script)
脚本 Chinese (Simplified Chinese script)
腳本 Chinese (Traditional Chinese script)
Сцэнар Belarussian (Cyrillic script)
လက်ရေး Burmese (Myanmar script)
დამწერლობა Georgian (Georgian script)
Γραφή Greek (Greek script)
લિપિ Gujarati (Gujarati script)
Forgatókönyv Hungarian (Latin script)
लिपि Hindi (Devanagari script)
脚本 Japanese (Kanji script)
ಸ್ಕ್ರಿಪ್ಟ್ Kannada (Kannada script)
ស្គ្រីប Khmer (Khmer script)
스크립트 Korean (Hangul script)
ສະຄິບ Lao (Lao script)
സ്ക്രിപ്റ്റ് Malayalam (Malayalam script)
Hōtuhi Maori (Latin script)
ସ୍କ୍ରିପ୍ଟ Odia (Oriya script)
ਸਕ੍ਰਿਪਟ Punjabi (Gurmukhi script)
පිටපත Sinhala (Sinhala script)
கையால்... Tamil (Tamil script)
స్క్రిప్ట్ Telugu (Telugu script)
สคริปต์ Thai (Thai script)
བོད་སྐད Tibetan (Tibetan script)
